load_view_object(view : String, ?vars : Dynamic) : Void

inherited from system.base.Wet_controller
Load a view using an anonymous object to carry the variables. The loader is repeated here to save copying large strings (for performance) References would be better.

set_params(p : Array<String>) : Void

inherited from system.base.Wet_controller
This is called by the Reflection API during the startup phase and causes the routing parameters (URI options) to be stored for later retrival.
